::Shredder::

Shredder looks over at Mantella, a surprised look on his face.

"Yeah, I'm fine," he says despite the mechfluid flowing from his shoulder, 
and walks off a bit toward Bobertron. Shredder takes out the box that 
Bobertron had given him earlier, looking at it suspicioustly.

He shruggs, flipping it open and pressing the button.
